Name: THE ABYSS
About the game: THE ABYSS is a 2D puzzle about descent, in order to pass the levels you need to score a certain number of points and choose the right ways to pass the level. Someone threw a ball into a tunnel dug to the center of the Earth. But will he be able to get to the end? Falling into the abyss is a runner with puzzle elements on the configuration, in which you have to control a ball flying down. The goal of the game is to save at least one ball to the finish line and collect all the necessary crystals. There are many dangers waiting for you at the levels, which you must carefully think about in advance. Eventually, get to the center of the Earth!
